item.description:
The Occupy Wall Street movement has been criticizing Capitalism lately. What is wrong with their definition of Capitalism? What are the myths and truths about Capitalism? Join us for Brent's synthesis of the basic meaning of Capitalism.

Food, drink and conversation to follow.

----

MBTA Orange Line , Malden Center stop is about 1/2 mile from the Dockside
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Free State Project Tshirt

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: Capitalism
